name: IDLE CATS
description:
Directions: [Mouse Only] Clicking gives you money, use this money to buy upgrades in the Menu. The Menuis accessible by moving the mouse towards the bottom of the screen.

I wonder what the ? is.

IDLE CATS is a one button game developed with the CRISP game library. The music and sound effects are created by a random seed and by what appears on the screen, each run will sound a bit different.

CRISP Library: https://github.com/abagames/crisp-game-lib

Developed By:
